suite.name: script_007_ADRS Preferred terms are unique within an AMT top level hierarchy

test.name: 1 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360051000036108 Containered trade product pack reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 2 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360061000036106 Medicinal product reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 3 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360031000036100 Trade product unit of use reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 4 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360041000036105 Trade product pack reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 5 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360021000036102 Trade product reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 6 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360071000036103 Medicinal product unit of use reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 7 ADRS Preferred Terms are unique within 929360081000036101 Medicinal product pack reference set

parameter.name: query

test.name: 8 ADRS Terms are unique within 30446011000036105 container type

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId, 30446011000036105) group by term having count(conceptId) > 1;

test.name: 9 ADRS Terms are unique within 30383011000036100 form

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId, 30383011000036100) group by term having count(conceptId) > 1;

test.name: 10 ADRS Terms are unique within 30428011000036107 unit of measure

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId, 30428011000036107) group by term having count(conceptId) > 1;

test.name: 11 ADRS Terms are unique within 700000011000036109 unit of use

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId, 700000011000036109) group by term having count(conceptId) > 1;

test.name: 12 ADRS Terms are unique within 30344011000036106 Australian substance

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isKindOf_cr(conceptId, 30344011000036106) group by term having count(conceptId) > 1;
